Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for device information and control.

Integer.Name: ShutterTemp
Integer.Description: Shows the temperature of the shutter as an absolute physical value.

IntSwissKnife.Name: StatusDriverShutterValue
IntSwissKnife.Description: It's an error when the register returns a 0, 2, or more than 4.

Integer.Name: CoolerTemp
Integer.Description: Shows the temperature of the shutter as an absolute physical value.

Integer.Name: LensTemp
Integer.Description: Shows the temperature of the lens as an absolute physical value.

Integer.Name: GSK_SensorType8
Integer.Description: Controls the GSK as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to he video signal.

Float.Name: GSKV_SensorType8
Float.Description: Controls the GSK as an absolute physical value.

Integer.Name: GSK_SensorType2
Integer.Description: Controls the GSK as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to he video signal.

Float.Name: GSKV_SensorType2
Float.Description: Controls the GSK as an absolute physical value.

Integer.Name: GSK_SensorType6
Integer.Description: Controls the GSK as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to he video signal.

Float.Name: GSKV_SensorType6
Float.Description: Controls the GSK as an absolute physical value.

Integer.Name: GFID_SensorType8
Integer.Description: Controls the GFID as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to he video signal.

Integer.Name: GFID_SensorType2
Integer.Description: Controls the GFID as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to he video signal.

Integer.Name: GFID_SensorType6
Integer.Description: Controls the GFID as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to he video signal.

Float.Name: GFIDV_SensorType8
Float.Description: Controls the GSKV as an absolute physical value.

Float.Name: GFIDV_SensorType2
Float.Description: Controls the GSKV as an absolute physical value.

Float.Name: GFIDV_SensorType6
Float.Description: Controls the GSKV as an absolute physical value.

Integer.Name: IsShutterImplemented
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when shutter implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: IsTemperatureSensorImplemented
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates if camera provide Temperature Sensor.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when Temperature Sensor implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: IsPleoraExpansorImplemented
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates if camera provide Pleora Expansor.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when Pleora Expansor implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: IsCompassImplemented
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when Compass implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: IsSPIMemoryImplemented
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates if camera provide SPI Memory.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when SPI Memory implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: IsLensImplemented
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates if camera provide Morotized Lens.
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when Morotized Lens, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: TBD1Implemented
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when TBD 1 implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: TBD2Implemented
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when TBD 2 implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: TBD3Implemented
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when TBD 3 implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: TBD4Implemented
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when TBD 4 implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: TBD5Implemented
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when TBD 5 implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: TBD6Implemented
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when TBD 6 implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: TBD7Implemented
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when TBD 7 implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: TBD8Implemented
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when TBD 8 implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: TBD9Implemented
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. 1 when TBD 9 implemented, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: PixelPitch
Integer.Description: Distance between pixel center.

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.Description: Controls the GSK as an absolute physical value.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.Description: Controls the GSK as an absolute physical value.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device. It represents all the information provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter combined in a single feature.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for image format control features.
Category.Description: Category for image format control features.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the transport layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport layer control features.

Category.Name: StreamControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Stream Control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Stream Control features.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

Integer.Name: MaximumDeviceResponseTime
Integer.Description: Maximum time until a device sends a response upon a received command not including the time needed to send the response over the link in ms..

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestTableAddress
Integer.Description: Address of the Manifest Table.

Integer.Name: DeviceSBRMAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Address of the Technology Specific Bootstrap Register Map.
Integer.Description: Address of the Technology Specific Bootstrap Register Map.

Integer.Name: DeviceHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.Description: Heartbeat Timeout in ms.

Integer.Name: DeviceMessageChannelID
Integer.ToolTip: channel_id used for the message channel.
Integer.Description: channel_id used for the message channel.

Integer.Name: DeviceTimestamp
Integer.Description: Current device time in ns.

Integer.Name: DeviceTimestampIncrement
Integer.Description: Timestamp increment in ns/tick.

Integer.Name: DeviceAccessPrivilege
Integer.Description: Access Privilege.

Integer.Name: DeviceProtocolEndianess
Integer.Description: Endianess of the protocol implementation.

Integer.Name: DeviceImplementationEndianess
Integer.Description: Endianess of the device implementation.

Integer.Name: DeviceUptime
Integer.Description: Time of Device boot.

Integer.Name: DeviceMaxThroughput
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates max data in bits from the camera each second.
Integer.Description: Indicates max data in bits from the camera each second.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceConnectionStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the status of the specified Connection.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the status of the specified Connection.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimitMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active. When disabled, lower level TL specific features are expected to control the throughput. When enabled, DeviceLinkThroughputLimit controls the overall throughput.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link.
Integer.Description: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link. If necessary, delays will be uniformly inserted between transport layer packets in order to control the peak bandwidth.

Float.Name: DeviceCommandTimeout
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the command timeout of the specified Link.
Float.Description: Indicates the command timeout of the specified Link. This corresponds to the maximum response time of the device for a command sent on that link.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its initial state and default settings.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its initial state and default settings.

Enumeration.Name: SensorDigitizationTaps
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.
Enumeration.Description: Number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Size of a pixel in bits.
Enumeration.Description: Size of a pixel in bits.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMin
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the minimum pixel value transferred from the camera.
Integer.Description: Indicates the minimum pixel value transferred from the camera.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum pixel value transferred from the camera
Integer.Description: Indicates the maximum pixel value transferred from the camera.

Enumeration.Name: Deinterlacing
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls how the device performs de-interlacing.
Enumeration.Description: Controls how the device performs de-interlacing.

EnumEntry.Name: LineDuplication
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device performs de-interlacing by outputting each line of each field twice.
EnumEntry.Description: The device performs de-interlacing by outputting each line of each field twice.

EnumEntry.Name: Weave
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device performs de-interlacing by interleaving the lines of all fields.
EnumEntry.Description: The device performs de-interlacing by interleaving the lines of all fields.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the acquisition of the device at the end of the current frame.
Command.Description: Stops the acquisition of the device at the end of the current frame.

Enumeration.Name: GainShutPrior
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the priority of the Exposure and Gain.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the priority of the Exposure and Gain.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.

Integer.Name: GenCPVersionMajor
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GenCPVersionMinor
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification.

Integer.Name: U3VVersionMajor
Integer.Description: Major version of USB3 Vision.

Integer.Name: U3VVersionMinor
Integer.Description: Minor version of USB3 Vision.

Boolean.Name: U3VCPSIRMAvailable
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if the device supports at least one device streaming interface.
Boolean.Description: Set if the device supports at least one device streaming interface.

Boolean.Name: U3VCPEIRMAvailable
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if the device supports at least one device event interface.
Boolean.Description: Set if the device supports at least one device event interface.

Boolean.Name: U3VCPIIDC2Available
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if the device supports IIDC2 register map.
Boolean.Description: Set if the device supports IIDC2 register map.

Integer.Name: U3VMaxCommandTransferLength
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the maximum supported command length of the device in bytes.
Integer.Description: Specifies the maximum supported command length of the device in bytes.

Integer.Name: U3VMaxAcknowledgeTransferLength
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the maximum supported acknowledge length of the device in bytes.
Integer.Description: Specifies the maximum supported acknowledge length of the device in bytes.

Integer.Name: U3VNumberOfStreamChannels
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the number of Stream Channels. 0, if no stream channel is supported
Integer.Description: Specifies the number of Stream Channels. 0, if no stream channel is supported

Integer.Name: U3VSIRMAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Address of the first Streaming Interface Register Map.
Integer.Description: Address of the first Streaming Interface Register Map.

Integer.Name: U3VSIRMLength
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the length of each SIRM.
Integer.Description: Specifies the length of each SIRM.

Integer.Name: U3VEIRMAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Address of the Event Interface Register Map.
Integer.Description: Address of the Event Interface Register Map.

Integer.Name: U3VEIRMLength
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the length of each EIRM.
Integer.Description: Specifies the length of each EIRM.

Integer.Name: U3VIIDC2Address
Integer.ToolTip: Address of the IIDC2 register set.
Integer.Description: Address of the IIDC2 register set.

Integer.Name: U3VCurrentSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the current speed of the USB link.
Integer.Description: Specifies the current speed of the USB link.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates whether a live grab is under way

Integer.Name: U3VSIPayloadSizeAlignment
Integer.Description: Limit SI Streaming Size.

Integer.Name: U3VSIRequiredPayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Minimum required payload size in bytes with current settings required by the device.
Integer.Description: Minimum required payload size in bytes with current settings required by the device.

Integer.Name: U3VSIRequiredLeaderSize
Integer.ToolTip: Device reports its minimum required size in bytes it needs for the leader transfer.
Integer.Description: Device reports its minimum required size in bytes it needs for the leader transfer.

Integer.Name: U3VSIRequiredTrailerSize
Integer.ToolTip: Device reports its minimum required size in bytes it needs for the Trailer transfer.
Integer.Description: Device reports its minimum required size in bytes it needs for the Trailer transfer.

Integer.Name: U3VSIMaximumLeaderSize
Integer.ToolTip: Defines the maximum size of the leader the device may use.
Integer.Description: Defines the maximum size of the leader the device may use.

Integer.Name: U3VSIPayloadTransferSize
Integer.ToolTip: the size of regular payload bulk transfers.
Integer.Description: the size of regular payload bulk transfers.

Integer.Name: U3VSIPayloadTransferCount
Integer.ToolTip: the number of regular payload data bulk transfers.
Integer.Description: the number of regular payload data bulk transfers.

Integer.Name: U3VSIPayloadFinalTransfer1Size
Integer.ToolTip: the size of the Final Transfer 1 payload bulk transfer.
Integer.Description: the size of the Final Transfer 1 payload bulk transfer.

Integer.Name: U3VSIMaximumTrailerSize
Integer.ToolTip: the maximum size of the trailer the device may use.
Integer.Description: the maximum size of the trailer the device may use.

Integer.Name: U3VSIPayloadFinalTransfer2Size
Integer.ToolTip: the size of the Final Transfer 2 payload bulk transfer.
Integer.Description: the size of the Final Transfer 2 payload bulk transfer.
